song_lyrics: Neḍo lāgo re have nav chhuṭe,
jem hīro te foḍtā kedī na fūṭe... māre 1
Hu to vaḷgī re Harivarnī belī,
Mārā vahālāthī hu nav thāu aḷgī,
jem megh sangāthe chapaḷā vaḷgī... māre 3
jem rekhā te khenchī vajrane māthe... māre 4
title: Māre lāgo re Harivarthī neḍo

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-654: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
